mapper.select: select CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERNAME, PASSWORD, CUSTOMERSEX, CUSTOMERAGE, CUSTOMERBIRTHDAY, CUSTOMERFIRSTNAME, CUSTOMERLASTNAME, CUSTOMERTYPE, CUSTOMERTEL1, CUSTOMERTEL2, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERQQ, CUSTOMERMSN, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, CUSTOMERPROVINCE, CUSTOMERCITY, CUSTOMERADDRESS, CUSTOMERZIPCODE, CUSTOMERFAX, CUSTOMERRESERVE1, CUSTOMERRESERVE2, CUSTOMERRESERVE3, CUSTOMERRESERVE4, CUSTOMERRESERVE5, CUSTOMERRESERVE6, CUSTOMERRESERVE7, CUSTOMERRESERVE8, CUSTOMERRESERVE9, CUSTOMERRESERVE10, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ORDERCOUNT, ORDERNUM, ORDERMONEY, SLEVEL, ORDERRESERVE1, ORDERRESERVE2 from DB_CUSTOMER where CUSTOMERID = #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
